for i in range(t):

import math
t=int(input())
for ii in range(t):
 n,q=[int(x) for x in input().split()]
 arr=[int(x) for x in input().split()]
 pre=[]
 s=0
 for i in arr:
  s+=i
  pre.append(s)
 for i in range(q):
  l,r=[int(x) for x in input().split()]
  l-=1
  r-=1
  if(l==0):
   print(pre[r])
  else:
   print(pre[r]-pre[l-1])

T = int(input())
for i in range(T):
 a = input().split(" ")
 N = int(a[0])
 Q = int(a[1])
 if(N>=1 and N<=100000 and Q>=1 and Q<=100000):
  b = input().split(" ")
  l = list(map(int,b))
  l1 = []
  for k in range(Q):
   q = input().split(" ")
   l1.extend(q)
     
  l2 = list(map(int,l1))
  m = 0
  while(m<len(l2)-1):
   s = 0
   c = l2[m]
   d = l2[m+1]
   for t in range(c-1,d):
    s = s + l[t] 
   print(s)
   m = m+2

T = int(input())
for i in range(T):
 N,Q = map(int,input().split())
 lis = list(map(int,input().split()))
 cumSum = [0]
 for j in lis:
  cumSum.append(cumSum[-1]+j)

  x,y = map(int,input().split())
  print(cumSum[y]-cumSum[x-1])

n=int(input())
while(n>0):
 l=list(map(int,input().split()))

  l2=list(map(int,input().split()))
  s=0
  for i in range(l2[0]-1,l2[1]):
   s=s+l1[i]

  l[1]=l[1]-1
 n=n-1
